description:
Permanently remove a file from a release.

This will also remove the physical file from storage.

path_parameters.description: the slug of the organization the release belongs to.
path_parameters.name: organization_slug

path_parameters.description: the version identifier of the release.
path_parameters.name: version

path_parameters.description: the ID of the file to delete.
path_parameters.name: file_id

title: Delete an Organization Release's File
